name: Grimmia, the Savior of Myth
text: Continuous: Whenever this card attacks, you may search your main deck for a weapon [Addition:J/Resonator] and add it to this card. Then shuffle your main deck. Activate. Pay : This card gains Swiftness and Target Attack until end of turn. Activate. Pay , banish an addition added to this card: Rest up to two target J/resonators.
